languages.text: Отряды Соломона и Вольного Торговца действуют более эффективно благодаря боевому опыту, полученному Лорд-капитаном в Адептус Арбитес.
Solomorne's and the Rogue Trader's squads act with greater effectiveness thanks to the Lord Captain's past combat experience in the Adeptus Arbites.
languages.original_text: Отряды Соломона и Вольного Торговца действуют более эффективно благодаря боевому опыту, полученному Лорд-капитаном в Адептус Арбитес.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne's and the Rogue Trader's squads act with greater effectiveness thanks to the Lord Captain's past combat experience in the Adeptus Arbites.
Solomorne's and the Rogue Trader's squads act with greater effectiveness thanks to the Lord Captain's past combat experience in the Adeptus Arbites.
Solomorne's and the Rogue Trader's squads act with greater effectiveness thanks to the Lord Captain's past combat experience in the Adeptus Arbites.

Solomorne's and the Rogue Trader's squads act with greater effectiveness thanks to the Lord Captain's past combat experience in the Adeptus Arbites.

languages.text: 行商浪人曾在帝国法务部服役，拥有丰富的战斗经验，索罗蒙与行商浪人的小队也因此变得更有效率。
languages.original_text: Solomorne's and the Rogue Trader's squads act with greater effectiveness thanks to the Lord Captain's past combat experience in the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人曾在帝国法务部服役，拥有丰富的战斗经验，索罗蒙与行商浪人的小队也因此变得更有效率。

languages.text: ソロモーンとローグトレーダーの部隊は、ロード・キャプテンの高等裁定局での過去の戦闘経験のおかげで、より効果的に行動している。
languages.original_text: Solomorne's and the Rogue Trader's squads act with greater effectiveness thanks to the Lord Captain's past combat experience in the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: ソロモーンとローグトレーダーの部隊は、ロード・キャプテンの高等裁定局での過去の戦闘経験のおかげで、より効果的に行動している。

languages.text: Die Trupps von Solomorne und {rt_mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} agieren dank der früheren Kampferfahrungen des Lord Captain bei den Adeptus Arbites effektiver.
languages.original_text: Solomorne's and the Rogue Trader's squads act with greater effectiveness thanks to the Lord Captain's past combat experience in the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: Die Trupps von Solomorne und {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} agieren dank der früheren Kampferfahrungen des Lord Captain bei den Adeptus Arbites effektiver.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın Adeptus Arbites'te elde ettiği savaş tecrübesi sayesinde Solomorne ile Hür Tacir'e tabi mangalar şimdi daha seri, daha tesirli hareket ediyor.
languages.original_text: Solomorne's and the Rogue Trader's squads act with greater effectiveness thanks to the Lord Captain's past combat experience in the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın Adeptus Arbites'te elde ettiği savaş tecrübesi sayesinde Solomorne ile Hür Tacir'e tabi mangalar şimdi daha seri, daha tesirli hareket eder.

languages.text: Los escuadrones de Solomorne y {rt_mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente actúan con mayor efectividad gracias a la experiencia de combate de{rt_mf|l| la} Lord Capitán en el Adeptus Arbites.
languages.original_text: Solomorne's and the Rogue Trader's squads act with greater effectiveness thanks to the Lord Captain's past combat experience in the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: Los escuadrones de Solomorne y {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente actúan con mayor efectividad gracias a la experiencia de combate de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán en el Adeptus Arbites.

languages.text: L'expérience que {rt_mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a acquise au sein de l'Adeptus Arbites lui permet d'augmenter l'efficacité de ses escouades et celle de Solomorne.
languages.original_text: Solomorne's and the Rogue Trader's squads act with greater effectiveness thanks to the Lord Captain's past combat experience in the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: L'expérience que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a acquise au sein de l'Adeptus Arbites lui permet d'augmenter l'efficacité de ses escouades et celle de Solomorne.
